arts.ttl: Port Vale lose ground at the top following draw at Bromley
arts.sum: Connor Ripley preserved a point for the Valiants as he pulled off a string of fine saves.

arts.ttl: Bromley boss Andy Woodman delighted at Newcastle United draw in FA Cup
arts.sum: Bromley manager Andy Woodman always had a feeling his side would land ex-employers Newcastle United in the third round FA Cup draw. We have a real catalogue of players that we have taken since my time here that have gone on to do really good things.

Bromley are unbeaten in their last five games and have won their last three. Port Vale have lost just one of their last six games in all competitions. This will be the first ever competitive meeting...
